gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.fetcher.core

Class MetadataFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.fetcher.core.MetadataFetcher

  • public class MetadataFetcher
extends Object
    This class is responsible for fetching all metadata triples (non geometry related) from a source dataset and copying them first to the specified by the dataset local unmodified graph and second, if the populateTransformationGraph flag is set, to the local transformed graph.
    Author:
    Thomas Maroulis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetadataFetcher(Dataset dataset, FetcherWorker callback, boolean populateTransformedGraph, com.google.common.base.Optional<List<String>> linkedNodes)
      Constructs a new instance of MetadataFetcher tied to a specific dataset.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fetchMetadata(Map<String,MatchedRule> matchedRules)
      Fetches metadata triples from the source graph and enters it in the local unmodified graph and, if the populateTransformedGraph is set, into the local transformed graph.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetadataFetcher

        public MetadataFetcher(Dataset dataset,
               FetcherWorker callback,
               boolean populateTransformedGraph,
               com.google.common.base.Optional<List<String>> linkedNodes)
        Constructs a new instance of MetadataFetcher tied to a specific dataset. linked nodes list and with the specified populateTransformationGraph flag.
        Parameters:
        dataset - a dataset object containing all information pertaining to source and destination datasets.
        callback - callback
        populateTransformedGraph - true if triples are to be copied to the transformated graph, false otherwise
        linkedNodes - optional of a list of node URIs to be fetched. If absent all root nodes (as defined by the dataset) will be fetched.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchMetadata

        public void fetchMetadata(Map<String,MatchedRule> matchedRules)
        Fetches metadata triples from the source graph and enters it in the local unmodified graph and, if the populateTransformedGraph is set, into the local transformed graph.
        Parameters:
        matchedRules - a map of matched rules that specify the triple patterns to be excluded as non-metadata
